Blog.post: don't stay away this place was meant to be yours the price you pay cannot be meant to be yours freedom is here if it's anywhere between you and i never a lie room for everything room to be you and me just you and me

you don't fool me with your organization and easy breathing i sit with you, my friend i sit with you you choose to walk the coals so go i you choose to sit by the fire so will i i'll not abandon you i'll not abandon this love like it or not i'm here and i'll not shrink back stand with you i will i stand with you

lov eyou i do don't be sad wish i could fill your emptiness with laughter and giggles things are going to be alright reach out and go with the flow dont hold on so tight you cannot lose that which is a part of you....

you say she asked you to do this with an open heart i see she did not know you yet i'd like to see you try to do it without an open heart my love, our hearts are stuck on open sometimes a blessing sometimes a curse an infinite capacity for love there's always room for more i'm learning that also means there's always a vacancy in this emptiness i am and here i am alone and it is so sad my heart breaks in the silence the knots will untie themselves as you say trite, but true it's in the living, i've heard when you live the questions you live your way into the answers when will i learn to sit with this emptiness this vacancy in my heart and not shake how can emptiness ever be anything other?

this is supposed to be my homework she asked me if i could just try to do this with an open heart has my heart been closed? what do i think? what do i feel? what do i know? ask I : why does it matter? and what if im so tangled that i do not have the answers to these questions? the knots will untie themselves sounds trite feels that way too
blog away with me....where are you? post...spill...i am here...

it enters slowly i can feel it c r e e p i n g in a shift in my heart rate a rythm from within internal thermometers gone awry a soured smile eyes can only cry this pain is from a different time a different place the black and blues are on my heart but not my face a day that infected me with shame and guilt and hate i was just a child all this love...may have come to late....

im a liar and im angry the poisonous tears they sting and burn and im all broken up when will i be heard when will it be my turn i sit and listen to all that you say i sit and i listen each and every day no one really wants to know whats going on im an experiment an excercise a life gone wrong and im angry but i hide it well im angry and in pain and yet the truth i cannot tell i'll not run away again but theres something you should know im standing up and fighting back we all reap what we sow...
my guilded cage is my brain where i create my own pain i don't think it's quite the same but then again pain is pain either way i don't care because you're right i am there and you are here with me

you ask why i perch inside this guilded cage you look at me with a thousand eyes and i move closer but say nothing like a dandelion born to a summer day i must surrender to the wind flying free in the depths in another dimension amoung the lovers look now, open your eyes you are here too
the silly gRl laughed.... ...paused for a long and deep breath....she smiled at the blonde beauty before her.... and then she asked.... "wanna come over?"
